source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Watercolour Wildlife Painting  - How To Paint a Red Squirrel
items.headline: Paint wildlife in watercolour using fine details and various techniques
objectives_summary: Let me guide you step by step on how to paint a realistic red squirrel in watercolour
The steps to be able ot paint wildlife in waterecolour
How to paint layered and thick looking fur

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Clover & Chamomile - Flower bouquet

visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will paint Clover & Chamomile Flower bouquet with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint flowers: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, glazing, detailing
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Modern Folk Art : Drawing and Painting Decorative pots!
items.headline: Make fun, decorative drawing and paintings of pots in a modern folk art style!
objectives_summary: Learn to paint modern folk art paintings using gouache/your favorite medium.
Get 3 FREE Coloring pages!
Make fun designs of pots as well as floral and geometrical designs to go on them.

items.title: Watercolor Magic: Creating Absctact Landscapes
items.headline: Discover the magic of watercolors and use it in your paintings
objectives_summary: the fastest and easiest way to prepare watercolor paper
create landscapes using only two colors
manipulate the watercolors around the canvas

items.title: 21 days of creative art therapy

visible_instructors.title: Louise Kluyts
visible_instructors.name: Louise
visible_instructors.job_title: More than an artist, a way of life through art...

items.headline: Awaken your inner artist!
objectives_summary: The course is designed to help students use basic art rules to explore and discover their creativity. Excellent art therapy

21 Days of art. Doing art for 21 days to discover what inspires you. a Daily art project stretched over 21 days at your own pace. It takes 21 days to break a habit. Lets take 21 days to create creative habits. affirmation.
You will work with a variety of art materials. It is important to be exposed to variety, Different mediums speak to different artist. Discover your medium through playing.

items.title: Painting Wild Places with Watercolors: Sea Foam

visible_instructors.name: Gary
visible_instructors.title: Gary Spetz
visible_instructors.job_title: Signature Member of the National Watercolor Society

items.headline: Step-by-step instructional videos with a downloadable Color Painting Reference and full-size Traceable Drawing Guide.
objectives_summary: Successfully paint a bold, dynamic, detailed watercolor landscape.
Gain confidence in controlling the sometimes unwieldy characteristic of watercolor.

items.title: Drawing Cherries: How To Layer In Colored Pencil
items.headline: Learn How To Apply Colored Pencil For Realistic Results
objectives_summary: How to Layer in Colored Pencil

items.title: Nature  - Paint in Oil Painting For All Level
items.headline: Be patient and learn the techniques from professional artist.
objectives_summary: Understand the concepts of Drawing, Values, Color, and Edges
Learn how to blend and mixing colours on the canvas itself
Have A Basic Understanding On How To Highlight ,contrast , shadow and brightness Oil Paint On The Canvas.

items.title: Basic Portrait Drawing Techniques- Beginners and Advanced
items.headline: Realistic human portrait Drawing,Shading technique with pencil powder, Pencil drawing, Step-by-step portrait sketching
objectives_summary: Familiarity with the tools needed for face sketching
Learn how to draw a sketch on a piece of paper
Basic sketch and shading training with a variety of brushes

items.title: Watercolor paint a MODERN style picture with limited palette

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Learn to paint glass, smoke, and create lettering as you design a contemporary painting. Use this template to paint more
objectives_summary: Learn to paint with watercolour paints and create something stunning along the way.
Learn some tricks and tips you using this popular medium in a controlled and fun way.
Discover a way to paint glass and smoke, and represent printed matter simply.

How to paint landscapes with gouache
